label: None
description: Summarizes Jobs data reported to the Screwdriver database.

label: GPU Count
description: A categorization of jobs into discrete groups based on the number of GPUs used by each job.

label: Job Size
description: A categorization of jobs into discrete groups based on the number of cores used by each job.

label: Job Wait Time
description: A categorization of jobs into discrete groups based on the total linear time each job waited.

label: Job Wall Time
description: A categorization of jobs into discrete groups based on the total linear time each job took to execute.

label: Node Count
description: A categorization of jobs into discrete groups based on node count.

label: PI
description: The principal investigator of a project.

label: QOS
description: The quality of service of the job

label: Queue
description: Queue pertains to the low level job queues on each resource.

label: Resource
description: A resource is a remote computer that can run jobs.

label: Resource Type
description: A categorization of resources into by their general capabilities.

label: System Username
description: The specific system username of the users who ran jobs.

label: User
description: A person who is on a PIs allocation, hence able run jobs on resources.
